suncertify.gui.util
Class DateHelperManager

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.gui.util.DateHelperManager

public class DateHelperManager
extends java.lang.Object

This Object serves as a Tool tip presentation of the Date entry for the user when adding a new Hotel Record. Its Guides the user on expected input requited by the JTextFields

Author:
Segun

Constructor Summary
DateHelperManager(javax.swing.JTextField y, javax.swing.JTextField m, javax.swing.JTextField d)
          Constructs this Object with the Year, Month and Day JTextFields respectively to be dynamically changing text state in respect of user input either right/wrong
 
Method Summary
 void reInit(javax.swing.JTextField f, java.lang.String s)
          Re initialise the provided JTextField by setting its text value to the String value passed into the function argument
 void startWrite(javax.swing.JTextField f)
          Disable the JTextField helper contents and make it suitable for user to enter value
 void written(javax.swing.JTextField f)
          If the user input is valid, this function call makes the help tool not show up

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
